snippet: The City Council president announced a plan that would increase affordable housing through new construction and the rehabilitation of city-owned properties.
abstract: Philadelphia City Council president Darrell L Clarke announces plan that would increase affordable housing through new construction and rehabilitation of city-owned properties; city will issue $100 million in bonds and leverage additional $200 million in state and federal tax subsidies to pay for program intended to help offset dwindling supply of low-income housing in city.
lead_paragraph: The City Council president announced a plan that would increase affordable housing through new construction and the rehabilitation of city-owned properties.

headline.main: Plan for Affordable Housing in Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Plan for Affordable Housing in Philadelphia
